Verses: 1 pinbu Naam Thirumbi, Basaanukkup Pogira Vazhiyaaip Ponom; Baasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ok Thannudaiya Sagala Janangalodum Nammode Edhirththu Yuththampannumbadi Purappattu, Edhreyikku Vandhaan.

2 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Avanukkup Bayappadavendaam; Avanaiyum Avanudaiya Janangal Ellaaraiyum Avan Dhesaththaiyum Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduththen; Esponile Kudiyirundha Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seekonukku Nee Seydhadhupola, Avanukkum Seyvaai Endraar.

3 appadiye Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Baasaanin Raajaavaagiya Okaiyum Avanudaiya Sagala Janangalaiyum Nammudaiya Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Avanukku Oruvarum Meedhiyaayiraamarpogumattum Avanai Muriya Adiththom.

4 akkaalaththile Avanudaiya Pattanangalaiyellaam Pidiththom; Avargalidaththil Naam Pidiththukkollaadha Pattanam Illai; Baasaanilirundha Okin Raajyamaana Aruvadhu Pattanangalulla Arkop Dhesam Muzhuvadhaiyum Pidiththom.
5 andhap Pattanangalellaam Uyarndha Madhilgalaalum Aranaakkappattirundhadhu; Avaigal Andri, Madhilillaadha Pattanangalum Anegam.
6 avaigalaiyum Sangaarampanninom; Naam Esponin Raajaavaagiya Seekonukkuch Seydhadhupola, Andha Ellaap Pattanangalilumulla Purusharaiyum Sthireegalaiyum Pillaigalaiyum Sangaarampanninom.
7 aanaalum Pattanangalilulla Aasthiyaiyum Sagala Mirugajeevangalaiyum Namakkendru Kollaiyittom.
8 ippadiye Yordhaanukku Ippuraththilulla Arnon Nadhithodangi, Ermon Malaivaraikkumulla Dhesaththai Naam Akkaalaththil Emoriyarudaiya Irandu Raajaakkalidamirundhu Pidiththom.
9 seedhoniyar Ermonaich Cheeriyon Engiraargal; Emoriyaro Adhaich Cheneer Engiraargal.
10 samanaana Naattin Ellaap Pattanangalaiyum, Keeleyaadh Muzhuvadhaiyum, Salkaayi, Edhreyi Ennum Paasaanilirundha Okudaiya Raajyaththin Pattanangalmattumulla Baasaan Muzhuvadhaiyum Pidiththom.

11 meendhirundha Iraatchadharil Baasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ok Enbavanmaaththiram Thappiyirundhaan; Irumpinaar Seydha Avanudaiya Kattil Manidharudaiya Kai Muzhaththinpadiye, Onbadhu Muzha Neelamum Naalumuzha Agalamumaayirundhadhu; Adhu Ammon Puththirarudaiya Rappaapattanaththil Irukkiradhallavaa?

12 akkaalaththile Sudhandharamaagap Petrukkonda Dhesaththai Arnon Nadhiyarukeyulla Aarover Thodangi, Keeleyaadh Malainaattil Paadhiyaiyum, Adhilirukkira Pattanangalaiyum, Roobaniyarukkum Kaaththiyarukkum Koduththen.

13 keeleyaaththin Matrappangaiyum, Okin Raajyamaayirundha Baasaan Muzhuvadhaiyum, Manaaseyin Paadhik Koththiraththukkuk Koduththadhum Andri, Raatchadha Dhesamennappatta Paasaanukkullaana Arkop Seemai Yaavaiyum Koduththen.

14 manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Yaaveer Arkop Seemai Muzhuvadhaiyum Kesooriyar Maagaaththiyar Enbavargaludaiya Ellaimattum Kattikkondu, Adharkuth Than Naamaththinbadiye Baasaan Avodhyaayeer Endru Perittaan, Adhu Innaalvaraikkum Vazhangivarugiradhu.
15 maakeerukkuk Keeleyaaththaik Koduththen.
16 melum Keeleyaath Thodangi Arnon Nadhi Odugira Pallaththaakkum, Kadaiyaandharamumaana Ammon Puththirarin Ellaiyaagiya Yopokku Aarumattum Irukkira Dhesaththaiyum,

17 kinnareth Thodangi Asdhodhpiskaavukkuth Thaazhvaaik Kizhakke Irukkira Uppukkadalaana Samanaana Veliyin Kadalmattum, Yordhaanin Ellaikkul Adangiya Samanaana Veliyaiyum, Roobaniyarukkum Kaaththiyarukkum Koduththen.

18 akkaalaththile Naan Ungalai Nokki: Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukku Indha Dhesaththaich Sudhandharamaagak Koduththaar; Yuththanjeyyaththakkavargalaaiya Neengal Ellaarum Isravel Puththiraraana Ungal Sagodhararukku Munne Aayudhapaanigalaaga Nadandhu Pongal.
19 ungal Manaivigalum Ungal Pillaigalum Ungal Aadumaadugalummaaththiram Naan Ungalukkuk Koduththa Ungal Pattanangalil Irukkattum; Ungalukkuth Thiralaana Aadumaadugal Undendru Ariven.

20 aanaalum Karththar Ungalai Ilaippaarappanninadhupola, Ungal Sagodhararaiyum Ilaippaarappanni, Yordhaanukku Appuraththil Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Kodukkira Dhesaththaich Sudhandhariththukkollumattum Neengal Irundhu, Pinbu Avaravar Naan Ungalukkuk Koduththa Ungal Sudhandharaththukkuth Thirumbuveergalaaga Endren.

21 akkaalaththile Naan Yosuvaavai Nokki: Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Andha Irandu Raajaakkalukkum Seydhavaigalaiyellaam Un Kangal Kandadhu; Nee Poich Cherum Ellaa Raajyangalukkum Karththar Appadiye Seyvaar.
22 avargalukkup Bayappadeergalaaga; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thaame Ungalukkaaga Yuththampannuvaar Endru Sonnen.
23 akkaalaththile Naan Karththarai Nokki:

24 karththaraagiya Aandavare, Neer Umadhu Adiyenukku Umadhu Magaththuvaththaiyum Umadhu Vallamaiyulla Karaththaiyum Kaanbikkath Thodangineer; Vaanaththilum Boomiyilum Ummudaiya Kiriyaigalukkum Ummudaiya Vallamaigalukkum Oppaagach Seyyaththakka Dhevanyaar?
25 naan Kadandhupoi Yordhaanukku Appuraththilulla Andha Nalla Dhesaththaiyum Andha Nalla Malaiyaiyum, Leebanonaiyum Paarkkumbadi Uththaravu Koduththarulum Endru Vendikkonden.
26 karththaro Ungal Nimiththam Enmel Kobangondu, Enakkuch Sevikodaamal, Ennai Nokki: Podhum, Ini Indhak Kaariyaththaik Kuriththu Ennode Pesavendaam.
27 nee Piskaavin Kodumudiyil Eri, Un Kangalai Merkilum Vadakkilum Therkilum Kizhakkilum Ereduththu, Un Kangalinaale Adhaip Paar; Indha Yordhaanai Nee Kadandhupovadhillai.
28 nee Yosuvaavukkuk Kattalai Koduththu, Avanaith Thidappaduththip Balappaduththu; Avan Indha Janangalukku Munbaagak Kadandhupoi, Avane Nee Kaanum Dhesaththai Avargalukkup Pangittukkoduppaan Endraar.
29 pinbu Pedhpeyorukku Edhiraana Pallaththaakkil Thangiyirundhom.
